author: Ruth Bender, Rachel Pannett
title: Pandemic Risks Mental Health Breakdown...
description: Pandemic Risks Mental Health Breakdown... (First column, 4th story, link ) Related stories: How Rituals and Focus Can Turn Isolation Into a Time for Growth... Drudge Report Feed needs your support! Become a Patron
content:
The battle to stop the coronavirus pandemic, fought with social distancing and enforced isolation, is taking a psychological toll that some officials warn could prompt another crisis, a mental-health one.
